reviewText: This exercise video is great and she is wonderful and clearly explains and models moves so that even a beginner can accomplish!
I'm new to pilates so this was really great for me. Easy to follow and a good, challenging workout.
Very easy to follow her workout.  She has a beautiful model body.  Long and lean is what I am hoping to achieve.
This ballet and pilates workout is not too hard but definitely is toning the shape of my body nicely.  I love doing it in the morning when I wake up.

I really love doing pilates and this video is excellent to do at home when you can't get to the gym.  She's a real ballet dancer and her form is so perfect.  She's easy to follow and I get a good workout.  I feel like I'm so much taller and leaner already. :)
